synopsis.text: Sukuna Gojo grew up in a wealthy but controlling household. Disgusted by his parents' behavior, he ran away from home at a young age. Now living alone on the streets, Sukuna survives using an SNS app called JUNGLE, which grants supernatural powers to its users. Intrigued after an encounter with JUNGLE's mysterious founder, the Green King Nagare Hisui, Sukuna decides to climb the ranks of the app's users. His goal is to meet the Green King in person and learn more about him. However, reaching the top rank requires defeating JUNGLE's most powerful user in battle. Sukuna faces a precarious path ahead, forced to master his unnatural abilities in order to unravel the secrets behind JUNGLE and its leader. His desire for answers drives him to overcome imposing obstacles despite the grave risks.
synopsis.author: anthropic.claude-v2:1
